title: For 1000th Normal Game win do you get to play with a rioter
body: I came back to this game with some of my friends back in season 4 and I've been playing a lot of norms lately and I'm at 999 normal game wins and i was just wondering if you still get to play with a rioter for your 1000th game

replies.body: Yup, it's still a thing! :) It's a bit harder for us to play with everyone 'cause there's a lot more of you guys than there are of us, but we try our best to make it happen!
Okay so can I get a game on my 4000th? You guys missed the last 3 :(
so i'm supposed to be getting 4 games with Riot soon? awesome!
like i don't really care i was just wondering if this was still a thing, my friend told me that apparently it is so i was just wondering if they were right or not
It's nothing official, but if you post on the boards maybe one will see you and be up for a game
It didn't happen to me as far as I know. haha
